title: Make Pine Village Your New Home - Call Savannah Now!
posting_body: ['Headline: AVAILABLE NOW!', 'FULLY RENOVATED  2 BEDROOM APARTMENTS', 'Come and see our newly upgraded homes for yourself!', 'CALL TODAY', 'show contact info', 'To see a virtual tour, please click on the link below', '<URL>', 'At Pine Village Apartments we have 32 newly renovated 2 bedroom 1 bath apartments.', 'These homes are fitted with brand new plank flooring and plush carpeting.', 'The kitchen includes brand new cabinets, quartz countertops, and a stainless steel sink with a gooseneck faucet.', 'Our remodeled bathrooms feature a new bathtub, cabinets and light fixtures.', 'From the oven to the windows, everything is brand new!Each apartment comes with a gas stove, refrigerator, and garbage disposal.', 'Spend a relaxing afternoon in the community courtyard.', 'Upper corner apartments include a balcony, perfect for hosting friends.', 'Create your ideal environment with central heating and air.', 'Our affordable complex is conveniently located near The Las Vegas Strip, Meadows Mall, Clark High School, and the College of Southern Nevada.', 'Amenities:', '•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0BBQ Area', '•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Refrigerator', '•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 2 Swimming Pools', '•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Laundry Facilities', '•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Playground', 'Location:', '3011 Arville St,Las Vegas, NV 89102', 'Rental Information:', '2 BR/1 BA\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0$1,195.00', 'Application Fee:', '$55* |', 'Lease Terms:', '12 months*A $250.00 holding fee applies to secure a unit of the requested size.', 'Upon approval, holding deposits are applied to move-in charges and are generally refundable if not approved, but certain terms and conditions apply.', 'Additional details available on application.', 'Westland Real Estate Group is a family-owned company that features 30 multi-family communities throughout Las Vegas.', 'With over 10,000 units in the area, we offer everything from studios to three-bedroom townhomes, with a variety of in-demand amenities.', 'Enjoy stress-free living in our well-maintained communities with clean grounds and professional staff.', 'At Westland, you’ve found a place where you can invest in your future.']
